underlying_goal: To add a disclaimer note to a paper about the use of development set data.
primary_success: Claude successfully translated a high-level request ('Add a note about dev set data') into a well-formatted LaTeX note box, placed it correctly in the paper, and recompiled the PDF.
brief_summary: The user requested adding a disclaimer to a paper stating that many results were from the development set and are being re-run on the test set. Claude created a formatted note box in LaTeX with the requested text, inserted it after the abstract, and recompiled the paper.
